It's like Boeing and Lockheed Martin saying Space X will never get off the ground. Look how that worked out for them. They, like many incumbents, protect themselves with regulations and arcane procurement rules. Instead, the goal is to innovate and iterate faster, so that we become cheaper and more deadly.
